Articles.Content:
Ya I don't really have a lot to say on this so just look at the pictures. It takes off at about 100 m/s and is like the Virgin Galactic in a way because the main plane gets the aircraft to about 15-17 thousand meters then you detach and fly the plane around, very good at landing with the plane on top. I also have another plane without it on top, just the main body it's called the Triton Lander, Hope you guys enjoy

Triton II http://www./?wigh5xcabjgx5ux

Triton Lander http://www./?qxv9exhyhj3c89a

Comment what you think of them and thanks for looking at these.
Looks nice, and maybe youshould move on to the next stage and make a spaceplane that can orbit!
